sourcesContent:
import React from 'react'; import { useLocation } from 'react-router-dom'; import { QRCodeSVG } from 'qrcode.react'; const DEFAULT_QR_DATA = 'https://sarkariibuss.com/Ba.2Kha9704'; const Invoice = () => { const location = useLocation(); const booking = location.state || {}; const userEmail = localStorage.getItem('userEmail'); const handleDownload = () => { window.print(); }; // Generate QR code data const qrData = booking.invoiceNumber ? JSON.stringify({ billNo: booking.invoiceNumber, date: booking.date, email: userEmail, seats: booking.selectedSeats?.join(', '), from: booking.from, to: booking.to, amount: booking.paymentDetails?.amount }) : DEFAULT_QR_DATA; return (

Collect Your Invoice

{/* Red Header */}

SWORGADWARI DELUXE

(Bus No.) {booking.busNumber || 'Ba. 2 Kha 9704'}

Bus Ticket

{/* Main Content */}
{/* Left Section */}

Bill No.: {booking.invoiceNumber}

NPR {booking.paymentDetails?.amount / booking.selectedSeats?.length} /seat

Date: {booking.date}

Email: {userEmail}

Total Seat No.: {booking.selectedSeats?.join(', ')}

Total No. of Passenger: {booking.selectedSeats?.length} Only

Pickup Station: {booking.from}

{booking.from} ----- {booking.to}

Arrive at {booking.arrivalTime || '05:45 PM'}

Departure at {booking.departureTime || '06:15 PM'}

Total Price

NPR {booking.paymentDetails?.amount}

Bill Paid
{/* Right Section */}

Bill No.: {booking.invoiceNumber}

Date: {booking.date}

Email: {userEmail}

From: {booking.from}

To: {booking.to}

Dept. Time: {booking.departureTime || '06:15 PM'}

Seat No.: {booking.selectedSeats?.join(', ')}

Total Passenger: {booking.selectedSeats?.length} Only

Total Price: NPR {booking.paymentDetails?.amount}

{/* Footer */}

Note: 40% charge for cancellation price 24 hours of programme

+977-9876543210, +977-0123456789 +977-9876543210
{/* Download Button */}
); }; export default Invoice;
